sentences.sContent: Replica weapons are indistinguishable from the real thing.
sentences.sCn: 仿真武器与真武器难以辨别。

remMethod.val: in(不) + distinguish(区分) + able(能) → 不能分辨的

trans.tranCn: 不能区别的，不能辨别的；不易察觉的
trans.tranOther: If one thing is indistinguishable from another, the two things are so similar that it is difficult to know which is which
